attributes.additional_details:
Since there is a long European tradition of naming international railway terminuses after military victories.
For example, Gare d'Austerlitz in Paris, and Waterloo in London. In addition St Pancreas is only a minor saint.
Since Waterloo is no longer an international terminus it would be appropriate to rename St Pancreas station Agincourt station to maintain
this European tradition.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Network Rail,  Incidentally, the station is currently named St Pancras, not St Pancreas.
